  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.property.TitleAttribute, org.obrel.core.Relatable

    UiDialogView, UiPopupView

    public abstract class UiChildView<V extends UiChildView<V>>
extends UiView<V>
    A view that is displayed as a child of another view.
